Jolly Imposter

Mar 12, 2011

Shame incomparable! “For unlawful impersonation, you are hereby banished to the high seas…” Santa’s head hung low in the hall as he avoided the stares of those men and women he had come to love at the company. How could he look at them now, imposter that he was?! He reached the office of the processing station. The young man at the keyboard there had already started filling in his information for the banishment. His eyes glanced back and forth uncertainly from computer to Santa. “Hmm. Ok. I don’t know how to spell your name. Would you mind?” Santa sat down at the computer and typed in: KAPLAN C. MONTGROGRAFIER The man resumed his seat and Santa waited. Maybe, he thought, I should have given my name as Santus Clausulus…
